snippet: Two cars were set on fire with Molotov cocktails and Hebrew graffiti was sprayed on the walls of a West Bank village, in apparent retaliation for an incident the day before.
abstract: Two cars were set on fire with Molotov cocktails and Hebrew graffiti was sprayed on the walls of a West Bank village, in apparent retaliation for an incident the day before.

headline.main: Israel's Defense Minister Calls Settlers' Attacks on Palestinians 'Outright Terror'
